addr: Seidenberg School of CSIS. Second Floor. New York, NY 10038
title: Hour of Code: Build Andriod Apps with MIT App Inventor
desc: In this session you will learn and use MIT App Inventor to build an Android app. You'll go over the excitement of mobile app development, and design and code your own app. You'll share it with your friends to showcase your work and see their reactions toward your accomplishments.?This is a quick and easy way to try out app development.?Open to everyone, especially those who never programmed before.
